Different Crime.Crime Name: Obstructing the Administration of Tax Laws
legal_basis: subsection 225.2(2) of the Income Tax Act
evidence_provided: attempts to shield assets through complex transactions and liquidation of properties
balance_of_convenience: delaying collection would jeopardize the debt owed

legal_basis: subsection 225.2(2) of the Income Tax Act
evidence_provided: schemes to evade taxes, falsely reporting gains, transferring proceeds without tax implications, attempts to shield assets from creditors
reasonableness_of_decision: more likely than not that delaying payment would jeopardize collection
judicial_review_result: Court dismissed the motion to strike the jeopardy collection order
